title: The Cleanse Pre-Treatment Ritual at SANA - Etéreo
cleaned_text: where we invite you to create your own "do it yourself" ritual as you journey through heat, water, sound, ice, and rain. Lather up with a seasonal curation of soaps, clays, scrubs, butters and oils available at reception. Choose three from each category to create your own SANA experience with these unique Riviera Maya healing ingredients: cacao soap, mayan honey clay, crystal infused detox mask, natural exfoliating fibers, SANA oil blend. unforgettable activities for
